data.title: Cambodia's GDP per capita expected to jump 40% in 2025 to $2,924: Govt - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia's GDP per capita in 2025 is expected to rise to $2,924—a rise of over 40 per cent over the projected 2024 figures, while economic growth is expected to reach 6.3 per cent, the office of the council of ministers said.

data.title: Thailand deports 6 Cambodian activists facing treason charges over critical Facebook comments - The Cambodia Daily
